name: Hidden Mahjong: Country Corner
description:
Mahjong: Country Corner is a relaxing Mahjong game with beautiful artwork and music, set in a lovely countryside world. Solve 20 beautiful, hand crafted boards as difficulty increases. Can you become the mahjong expert?

Main features:
- New mahjong mechanic and unique power system
- 20 hand-crafted backgrounds
- Beat your best times
- Daily rewards
- Replay for high scores
- Earn coins and unlock more boards
- Become the mahjong master!
